text: Goodou hagalee hala ma gaa gai nia mee aanei i goodou guu wanga nia mee humalia gi Dimaadua, ge goodou gii pula i goodou gi de hagamilimilia nia wanga dehuia dabu digau Israel i di godou miami i nia maa i mua di wanga nia mee ala koia e humalia. Goodou ma gaa hai beenei, gei goodou gaa mmade.”
